LanguageData.VCE_NoSoupsFound: No soups of that kind found in this map.
LanguageData.VCE_SelectSoup: Select a type of soup to be cooked
LanguageData.VCE_StartInsertionDesc: Bring a soup to the electric pot to start cooking
LanguageData.VCE_RemoveSoupDesc: Remove the soup from the pot. This can only be done before you start cooking it.
LanguageData.VCE_CancelBringingSoupDesc: Cancel bringing soup to the electric pot.
LanguageData.VCE_WaitTillJobsEnd: Wait until the soup has been brought to the electric pot, or cancel the job.
LanguageData.VCE_NotPowered: The electric pot is not powered
LanguageData.VCE_EngageDesc: Start cooking soup. This process takes 3 days and can't be interrupted, or the soup will be destroyed.
LanguageData.VCE_SoupFailurePower: The soup has spoiled due to a power failure in the electric pot
LanguageData.VCE_SoupFailurePowerWarning: The soup is spoiling fast due to a lack of fuel in the electric pot
LanguageData.VCE_SoupFinished: A soup has finished cooking in the electric pot
LanguageData.VCE_SoupInProgress: An {0} is cooking. It will be ready in {1}
LanguageData.VCE_SoupReady: A soup has finished cooking and is waiting for pickup
LanguageData.VCE_InsertMilkDesc: Select Milk to press in the cheese press. Different milks might produce different types of cheese.
LanguageData.VCE_NoMilksFound: No milks of that kind found in this map.
LanguageData.VCE_SelectMilk: Select a type of milk to be pressed
LanguageData.VCE_StartInsertionMilkDesc: Bring milk to the cheese press to start pressing
LanguageData.VCE_RemoveMilkDesc: Remove the milk from the press. This can only be done before you start pressing it.
LanguageData.VCE_CancelBringingMilkDesc: Cancel bringing milk to the cheese press.
LanguageData.VCE_WaitTillJobsEndMilk: Wait until the milk has been brought to the cheese press, or cancel the job.
LanguageData.VCE_EngageMilkDesc: Start pressing milk into cheese. This process takes a variable time and cheese will increase in quality with ripening. You can remove it at any time after the initial period.
LanguageData.VCE_CheeseFinished: A cheese has finished ripening in the cheese press
LanguageData.VCE_CheeseInProgress: Cheese press is pressing {0}. It will be ready with {1} quality in {2}
LanguageData.VCE_CheeseReady: This cheese has reached its desired degree of ripening and is waiting for pickup
LanguageData.VCE_MilkImproperlyDefined: This milk has been improperly defined to work with the cheese press, contact the milk mod's author
LanguageData.VCE_RemoveCheeseDesc: Remove cheese from the cheese press. The cheese will be ready at the present quality level ({0})
LanguageData.VCE_CheesePressEmpty: Cheese press is empty right now
LanguageData.VCE_CondimentEffectsAgave: Agave nectar is a thin and semi-sweet nectar, known for its healing and anti-inflammatory properties. Consuming meals that include this condiment gives a 15% immunity gain speed boost for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_CondimentEffectsSugar: Sugar is easily converted into energy by the body, which may result in a nice burst of energy. Consuming meals that include this condiment increases moving stat by 15% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_CondimentEffectsSpices: A variety of aromatic and pungent spices. Consuming meals that include this condiment increases manipulation stat by 10% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_CondimentEffectsSalt: Consuming meals that include this condiment increases mood by 5 for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_CondimentEffectsMayo: Mayonnaise, while terrible for you, adds a pleasing tang and is very calorically dense. Consuming meals that include this condiment lowers hunger rate by 15% for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_CondimentEffectsJelly: Consuming meals that include this condiment increases mood by 10 for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_CondimentEffectsButter: Consuming meals that include this condiment creates a smokeleaf high without addiction risks.
LanguageData.VCE_CondimentEffectsSyrup: Consuming meals that include this condiment increases mood by 7 for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_CondimentEffectsNanites: Consuming meals that include this condiment increases manipulation by 1% for 12 hours. The colonist will be resurrected if it is killed during that time.
LanguageData.VCE_CondimentEffectsKetchup: Consuming meals that include this condiment increases mood by 3 for 12 hours.
LanguageData.VCE_CondimentEffectsSauce: While particularly strong hot sauces hurt at first, they are known to numb pain and work up a warm sweat shortly after consumption. Consuming meals that include this condiment boosts pain resistance by 15% and cold temperature resistance by 10ºC for 12 hours. Mood will be reduced by 3.
LanguageData.VCE_NoEffectDesc: Consuming meals that include this condiment causes no negative health effects.
LanguageData.VCE_DiabetesEffectDescHalfPoint: Consuming meals that include this condiment causes Diabetes. Each ingestion of such a meal will increase colonist's Diabetes by 0.5%.
LanguageData.VCE_DiabetesEffectDescOneAndHalfPoint: Consuming meals that include this condiment causes Diabetes. Each ingestion of such a meal will increase colonist's Diabetes by 1.5%.
LanguageData.VCE_DiabetesEffectDescThreeQuarterPoint: Consuming meals that include this condiment causes Diabetes. Each ingestion of such a meal will increase colonist's Diabetes by 0.75%.
LanguageData.VCE_DiabetesDessertSimpleDesc: Consuming this meal causes Diabetes. Each ingestion of such a meal will increase colonist's Diabetes by 0.5%.
LanguageData.VCE_DiabetesDessertFineDesc: Consuming this meal causes Diabetes. Each ingestion of such a meal will increase colonist's Diabetes by 1.5%.
LanguageData.VCE_DiabetesDessertLavishDesc: Consuming this meal causes Diabetes. Each ingestion of such a meal will increase colonist's Diabetes by 2.5%.
LanguageData.VCE_DiabetesDessertGourmetDesc: Consuming this meal causes Diabetes. Each ingestion of such a meal will increase colonist's Diabetes by 3.5%.
LanguageData.VCE_HighBloodPressureEffectDesc: Consuming meals that include this condiment causes High Blood Pressure. Each ingestion of such a meal will increase colonist's High Blood Pressure by 0.75%.
LanguageData.VCE_HighBloodPressureEffectDescCanned: Consuming canned goods causes High Blood Pressure. Each ingestion of such a meal will increase colonist's High Blood Pressure by 1.5%.
LanguageData.VCE_CholesterolEffectDesc: Consuming meals that include this condiment causes Cholesterol. Each ingestion of such a meal will increase colonist's Cholesterol by 1%.
LanguageData.VCE_CholesterolEffectDescOneAndHalfPoint: Consuming meals that include this condiment causes Cholesterol. Each ingestion of such a meal will increase colonist's Cholesterol by 1.5%.
LanguageData.VCE_CholesterolEffectDescDouble: Consuming meals that include this condiment causes Cholesterol. Each ingestion of such a meal will increase colonist's Cholesterol by 2%.
LanguageData.VCE_CholesterolDescDeepFried: Consuming deep fried foods causes Cholesterol. Each ingestion of such a meal will increase colonist's Cholesterol by 1.5%.
